Tunable.name: HEIRLOOM_OWNER
Tunable.description: This should provide the format for the sim in posession of the heirloom object. Parameter 0 provides the name of the sim that owns the heirloom. e.g. 'In Possession Of: {0.SimName}'

Tunable.name: HEIRLOOM_TITLE
Tunable.description: This should provide the format for the title of an heirloom object hovertip. Parameter 0 provides the name of sim that created the heirloom. e.g. '{0.SimName}'s Heirloom'

TunableList.name: LOOTS_ON_HEIRLOOM_REMOVE
TunableList.description: A list of loots that will be applied when the heirloom component is removed or object destroyed. The Actor is the sim that created the heirloom. If the Actor does not exist, then loots will not be given. The Object is the heirloom object itself.
